original_text:
For they have gone up to Assyria
    like a wild donkey wandering alone.
    Ephraim has sold herself to lovers.
korean_text: 그들이 홀로 떨어진 들나귀처럼 앗수르로 갔고 에브라임이 값 주고 사랑하는 자들을 얻었도다

sentences.original_text: For they have gone up to Assyria
like a wild donkey wandering alone
Ephraim has sold herself to lovers
